name: Hakros Deja Vu (Map for Doom 2)
description:
Hi everyone, this is my second map, i'll hope you like it.... :-D !!

The Story

In the year 2372 after hundreds of years of mining operations, the UAC turned Mars into a toxic wasteland. When Earth government discovered that this extraction were producing the expulsion of toxic gases into the atmosphere, a war broke out for control of the planet. Now twenty years later, a fragile stalemate is in effect between the two factions but the UAC garrison remains ready to face any threat. But the UAC is conducting in secret the tests of the definitive weapon that will end the war once and for all. Today is the tests day...what could go wrong?

For best experience of custom soundtrack and sounds i recommend you to use earphones.

Thanks for your time.

PS: i'll hope you can survive !

--------------------------------------------------------

Instructions

  • Doom2.wad file required to play, just copy the file into 'games\' folder
  • Requires Doom 3 textures pack (D3Retrotex) (By hidfan)
  • https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=37&t=54839
  • Standalone already includes the textures pack.

--------------------------------------------------------

  • Name: Hakros Deja Vu
  • Version: 1.1
  • Format: UDMF
  • Port Needed: GZDoom
  • IWAD: Doom2.wad

  • Mods: Include and use BDLite modification by DavidN

  • Textures: D3RetroTex (Doom 3 textures by hidfan) (included on standalone version)
  • Jumping &﻿ Crouching: No

  • Dehacked file: No
